name: Can you keep a secret?
description:
There's no such thing as private properties on a coffeescript object!
But, maybe there are?

Implement a function `createSecretHolder(secret)` which accepts any value as secret and returns an object with __ONLY__ two methods (and no additional properties)

* `getSecret()` which returns the secret 
* `setSecret()` which sets the secret

```coffeescript
obj = createSecretHolder(5)
obj.getSecret() # returns 5
obj.setSecret(2)
obj.getSecret() # returns 2
```
